text: San Pietro a Patierno is an area located in the southern part of Naples, Italy. It is known primarily for its international airport, Naples International Airport, which is also referred to as Capodichino Airport. The airport serves as the main transportation hub for Naples and the surrounding region, handling both domestic and international flights. In addition to the airport, Capodichino is also home to various military bases and facilities. The area has a mix of residential, commercial, and industrial areas, with several hotels and restaurants catering to visitors arriving or departing from the airport. Category:Naples
title: San Pietro a Patierno
